name: Blue - A Platformer Demo PC
description:
Story: You are in  Colourland! A land which has always happiness! But , Blue, A block living in Colourland went inside a game where an evil developer is lurking. Can Blue survive him?

This is a game which is still in development.

Details:

RATING:  Everyone 3+

GENRE:  2D Platformer

ENGINE: Java

Enjoy!

Warning: The Java Engine used for this may crash. Please reinstall the game if problem persists.
